bug.author: brendan-rius
bug.description:
<denchmark-code>First, `tf.log` computes the logarithm of each element of `y`. Next, we multiply each element of `y_` with the corresponding element of `tf.log(y_)` </denchmark-code>
should be <denchmark-code>First, `tf.log` computes the logarithm of each element of `y`. Next, we multiply each element of `y_` with the corresponding element of `tf.log(y)` </denchmark-code>
